reviews.text: A beautiful place for spending the weekend with family and friends. Number one location . But try to avoid during peak time/ season. Heavy traffic with jaam about 2-3 hours to reach mussoorie back.

This hill station is 15-20 km away from mussorie and having a 5G network connectivity, so you won't face any network related issues.

Restaurant : Mehfil Restaurant
Places to visit : Eco Park
Apple orchid garden
Sarkunda devi temple
Wonderful location, with good roads and lot to discover, must visit in snow.

We started from Delhi and stay in Haridwar,
Next day we plan to go Dhanoulti and trust that was a big mistake cos take a wrong path that cause we got in big trouble in the velly of mountains the way was too much dangerous.
That was like a death adventure.
I love very much this place ☺️,this is my first time that I have ever seen snow ❄️ fall , beautiful place,

places_with_reviews.name: View Points
places_with_reviews.address: Chamba - Mussoorie Rd, Saklana Range, Uttarakhand 249145, India

reviews.text: what a beauty, amazing view point, must spend some time here
One of the best places in the whole Mussoorie-Dhanaulti-Kanatal-Chamba belt.

It is the best place in uttrakhand to visit and enjoy your holidays in summer as well as winter season.
Dhanaulti, an amazing place in Uttarakhand

One can directly go from dehradun or Mussoorie. A bus directly plies from dehradun at 6 a.m. and via Mussoorie it goes to Dhanaulti. Dhanaulti is an amazing place surrounded by snow capped hills.
It's a superb place to stay in kaanataal. Best service with delicious food. A must visit place.
